assessmentQuestionVersion.name: Sebelipase_Alfa_Renewal_Discountinuation_Criteria_Q2
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: Is the patient experiencing any adverse events (particularly hypersensitivity reactions, anaphylaxis, hypotension, fever) from treatment with sebelipase alfa which cannot be managed with standard treatment and/or have a significant impact on the patientâ€™s quality of life, or are life-threatening?
